welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vaucresson, the quaint and charming city known for its beautiful parks and gardens. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving a wide range of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
